title: N690 Kalamazoo Bats, N175 Gypsy Queen, N321 SF Hess, plus assorted 19th Century cards

posts.post_title: N690 Kalamazoo Bats, N175 Gypsy Queen, N321 SF Hess, plus assorted 19th Century cards
posts.post_content:
19th Century for sale page just posted on my website [URL="http://www.baseballcardresource.com/forsale/19th_Century/index.html"]here[/URL].

Also I have priced out my personal collection with some of my favorite 19th Century stuff [URL="http://www.baseballcardresource.com/forsale/Collection/index.html"]here[/URL].

[IMG]http://www.baseballcardresource.com/forsale/Collection/1887_N693_Boston_SGC30_6500.jpg[/IMG]

The team card is no longer available, but a few others are including these :
